title: Some teachers regard teaching as just a job, others see it as as their mission. What is the difference between mission and job? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m one of the teachers who sees teaching as a mission. mission: a path of helping others, being there for students who don’t have a support system, being that memorable teacher that everyone misses as adults, being a positive role model for the next generation job: someone working solely for the money, they don’t care about being a good teacher or a memorable role model I don’t see teaching as a job. It’s an income, yes, but it’s also a way to give back to the world in a positive way. Many students don’t have a stable support system, role model or someone to turn to in tough times. That’s why I decided to become a teacher.
